title: That Feeling you get
body:
When you log in and you're not banned. Maybe next time.

This community is the most fragile group of snowflakes I've encountered. If words hurt you in the make believe world, don't go outside. Or maybe, you should go slap that phone or tablet out of your stupid parents hand and go teach them how to build something and get dirt on their closes.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=awholepie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OgAMApFM,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-06T11:00:45.515+0000)
>
> If words hurt you in the make believe world, don&#039;t go outside.

Usually people aren't hurt by your words, they are just annoyed that they have to put up with you when they are trying to enjoy themselves. I play league for fun, not to listen to people bitch at me for every thing I do that they don't like. Riot realizes that they are losing business to people like that and have decided to kindly escort the people causing them to leave out of their establishment.

If you don't like it, you can always find another game to play. I would suggest a single player game, so that others don't have to put up with you.
I never put my team mates down for having a poor a game, but my choice of vocabulary to describe Rito's mathematics is just too strong of language for the league of snowflakes.
What math in particular do you have issues with?
I can see you are obviously a level headed and reasonable person.
